text: "One More Chance" is a song by American singer Michael Jackson that was released in 2003 as part of the greatest hits album Number Ones. The track features a smooth R&B; sound and showcases Jackson's signature vocal style. It revolves around themes of love and longing, with lyrics expressing a desire for another opportunity in a romantic relationship. The song was produced by Jackson and included a notable music video that combined footage from previous performances with new visuals. "One More Chance" received a positive reception, and it charted well in various countries, reflecting Jackson's enduring popularity.
title: One More Chance (Michael Jackson song)
